column3: Petitioners to  the  present application namely Mohomad Riyal  Mohomed  Rizan,  Osborn Lanka

notice to  quit dated 23.08.2016 served on the  1st  Petitioner marked P-23.
Grant  and  issue  a  mandate  in  the  nature  of  a  writ  of Prohibition  preventing  the  1st
